module_tabs_json.title: Red Panda
module_tabs_json.content: Village 88 Inc. was founded in 2011 while 457Avenue Inc. registered in the Philippines in 2013. It is the company’s vision to provide world-class IT education to brilliant individuals with less IT-career opportunity due to lack of industry experience or exposure. So far, Village 88, Inc. (V88) has produced 30+ talented software engineers from the Philippines who now worked with the company in incubating and launching businesses that bring a positive impact to the world.
